settings.question_faqs: Will your template be fully compatible with Shopify?
I cannot upload the theme to my Shopify store / Shopify alerts that the file is too big to upload, what is the problem?
settings.answer_faqs:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (the file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded.

3/ Find this file: Minion Made-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip in the folder Minion Made Sections Ready 3.0.0, then you just need to upload Minion Made-3.0.0-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

settings.question_faqs: What I have to do when I need your support?
settings.answer_faqs:
To save your time and reach our support quickly, please follow below steps:

1/ Create a staff account for us (with Themes permission and Settings permission) http://docs.shopify.com/manual/settings/account/staff-members

2/ Capture screenshot or video for the issue you get.

3/ Specify which template and version you are using.

4/ Describe clearly how to reproduce the issue.

5/ Send all information (staff account, screenshot, video, template name and version, description of the issues, link) to support@halothemes.com

settings.question_faqs: Would assistance be available to upload the template if needed?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we will assist you to install the template if needed

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys offer customisation services for your themes?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to support@halothemes.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off Lazy Loading Image / Item Animation / Fade Up on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off the animation in the Setting page.

settings.question_faqs: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).

settings.question_faqs: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.

settings.question_faqs: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs: The theme package includes theme source, Photoshop design files, sample data and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
settings.answer_faqs: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support image resizing and cropping?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes. Normally, the theme will resize images to a default size (based on your width/height ratio setting). We also have Crop setting if you don‚Äôt want to scale the image.

settings.question_faqs: Can I add borders around our product images?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. You can also set image border colours.

settings.question_faqs: Can I have multi level menu?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, you can. Just simply follow the instructions in our Manual Guide, you will be able to easily create a multi-level menu.

settings.question_faqs: Do you guys provide customer support during weekends / holidays?
settings.answer_faqs: Normally we don't provide support during weekends, except for urgent cases. In these cases, you only need to mark ‚ÄúUrgent‚Äù in your email, we will get back to you ASAP.

settings.question_faqs: Does the theme support Variant Image?
settings.answer_faqs: Yes, it does. Please check it out here to see how it works: https://sneake-demo.myshopify.com/products/sample-proin-de-corper-nulla-dan-melementum-1?variant=10214763888684

settings.des_faqs: Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to support@halothemes.com

settings.footer_address_code: ¬© 2020 Black Buck Coffee. All Rights Reserved.

settings.shipping_returns_content:
Our coffee ships free, always. For merchandise orders, shipping charges are calculated at checkout.

To provide you with the freshest coffee possible, we package and ship per order from our Cook County, IL distribution facility. Our merchandise is shipped separately from strategically place fulfillment partner facilities across the United States. Both our coffee and merchandise orders are shipped within 3 days of the order.

Returned coffee is not accepted as it is a perishable item, unless there was an issue such as a damaged delivery. Any express shipping where applicable is not refunded. Express shipping is Next Day Air, 2nd Day Air, 3 Day Select and other overnight or express shipping services that may have been requested by you. Ground shipping is not refunded unless our shipping department was at fault and your order arrived damaged. Time is of the essence. If you receive your order and notice the order is damaged you must contact us within 48 hours for an exchange. No exchanges or returns will be accepted after 48 hours.

Returned merchandise is accepted within 2 weeks of delivery. Any claims for misprinted/damaged/defective items must be submitted within 2 weeks after the product has been received. For packages lost in transit, all claims must be submitted no later than 2 weeks after the estimated delivery date.

Merchandise packages sent out from our US fulfillment centers are returned to our Charlotte facility. Its address: 11201 Ed Brown Rd, Charlotte, North Carolina, 28273. Meanwhile, packages sent out from our Europe location are automatically returned to our Europe fulfillment center. Its address: Lidostas parks, Marupes novads, Latvia LV-1500.
settings.custom_tab_content:
Whole bean coffee is roasted the same day it ships. When coffee beans are ground, the rate at which carbon dioxide is released increases quickly. To accomodate the degassing process, ground coffee orders ship the following day.

All coffee should be stored long term between 50 and 70 degrees Fahrenheit, at about 30 to 50 percent humidity. If you have green coffee beans they should be stored to the open air (example, burlap bag) and are good to roast for 2 to 4 years, depending on humidity. Keep them dry and away from water and sunlight. Roasted coffee beans should be kept in an air tight container, as well as ground coffee. You can store roasted coffees without much flavor loss for about a year unopened, or 2 years in the freezer. Coffee is still good past these dates if kept properly, but flavor fades away quickly over time. Once you open roasted beans or ground coffee you should plan to use it up within a week for the best flavor.

settings.title: Powerful, Flavor.
settings.des: We use a blend of Robusta and Arabica coffee beans produced from Bali to provide the most powerful, flavorful & balanced cup of coffee. Packaged and shipped directly from the United States of America.

settings.banner_des_1: Subscribe & save to our coffee products for door step delivery as often as you need it. Keep going.

settings.heading: Our new store will be  opening soon
settings.success_message: Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible

settings.heading:
Intense,
flavor.
settings.slide-des: Our coffee beans are grown on Mount Agung, an active volcano in Bali. Mount Agung is the highest point on Bali, and dominates the surrounding area, influencing the climate, especially rainfall patterns.

settings.banner_des: There are zero calories in Black Buck Coffee. Our beans are entirely natural and certified organic.
Our coffee beans are hand picked, wet-hulled and dried on raised beds.

Dried with the fruit attached to the seed further enhances the complexity and wild fruitiness of this exquisite coffee. Delivering a dry, winey crispness across the palate followed by a long pleasing finish mingling chocolate, vanilla, and exotic spices with just a hint of nuttiness.

Whole bean coffee is roasted the same day it ships. When coffee beans are ground, the rate at which carbon dioxide is released increases quickly. To accomodate the degassing process, ground coffee orders ship the following day.

Speed, focus, influence. The blackbuck is indigenous to eastern regions, providing a rare glimpse of beauty. The stark contrast and composure of this wild beast parallels the taste profile of our coffee.

Twisted, rigid and sharp. The antlers provide all the inspiration need for our team to continue to provide the best bucking coffee we can.

We calculate CO2 emissions associate with the delivery of your order. Calculations are based on package weight, distance and means transportation.

We work to offset these emissions by funding the equivalently calculated amount to Jar√≠ Para REDD+ Avoided Unplanned Deforestation project in the Amazon Rainforest, a Verified Carbon Standard project certified by Pachama.

settings.heading:
BE AN
ANIMAL.
settings.slide-des: Black Buck Coffee is harvested in the volcanic hills of Kintamani Bali, Indonesia by independent coffee farmers. The high elevation and loamy soil helps create a dark profiled coffee bean. Hand picked, wet-hulled and dried on raised beds.

settings.top_content:
It's important to us that you enjoy shopping with us. We want you to love our brand as much as you love our coffee. Please feel free to use the contact form to get in touch with any questions or compliments!

We are typically available between 9am & 6pm ET. Feel free to live chat using the services below.
